originalTitle: The king's speech - and why it has foreigners in South Africa worried
title: The king's speech - and why it has foreigners in South Africa worried
content: The Zulu king was trying to calm anti-migrant feelings but ended up using a highly derogatory phrase.

originalTitle: Aspiring Nigerian singer dies after being bitten by a snake
title: Aspiring Nigerian singer dies after being bitten by a snake
content: Ifunanya Nwangene, a former contestant in The Voice Nigeria, died after not getting the antivenom she needed.

originalTitle: More than 200 killed in mine collapse in DR Congo
title: More than 200 killed in mine collapse in DR Congo
content: The mine gave way after heavy rains on Wednesday, a local rebel spokesman says.

originalTitle: Israel says it will ban MSF from operating in Gaza
title: Israel says it will ban MSF from operating in Gaza
content: Medical charity has been barred for not providing Israeli authorities with personal details of its staff in enclave.

originalTitle: Man Utd strike late as Carrick extends perfect start in Fulham thriller
title: Man Utd strike late as Carrick extends perfect start in Fulham thriller
content: Manchester United produce stunning winner to beat Fulham 3-2 in Premier League thriller at Old Trafford.

originalTitle: Venezuela rights activist Javier Tarazona freed amid prisoner release
title: Venezuela rights activist Javier Tarazona freed amid prisoner release
content: Tarazona freed after four years in prison on 'terrorism' and conspiracy charges.

originalTitle: Twelve killed by Russian strike near bus in Ukraine, official says
title: Twelve killed by Russian strike near bus in Ukraine, official says
content: Seven others were reported injured in the strike on Sunday, according to preliminary information.

originalTitle: Epstein sent $75,000 to accounts linked to Mandelson, files suggest
title: Epstein sent $75,000 to accounts linked to Mandelson, files suggest
content: Lord Mandelson says he has no record or recollection of receiving the sums and does not know if the documents are authentic.

originalTitle: Iran's supreme leader warns of regional war if US attacks
title: Iran's supreme leader warns of regional war if US attacks
content: Trump earlier said Iran - which is due to begin a live-fire naval exercise in a key shipping route - was in "serious discussions".

originalTitle: Wolves accept reduced £48m offer for Strand Larsen
title: Wolves accept reduced £48m offer for Strand Larsen
content: Wolves have accepted a reduced offer worth £48m for striker Jorgen Strand Larsen from Crystal Palace.

originalTitle: Bellingham suffers injury on Real duty
title: Bellingham suffers injury on Real duty
content: England midfielder Jude Bellingham is substituted with what appears to be a hamstring injury early in Real Madrid's La Liga match against Rayo Vallecano.

originalTitle: Chelsea and Strasbourg in talks to swap defenders
title: Chelsea and Strasbourg in talks to swap defenders
content: Chelsea are in talks to recall Mamadou Sarr from Strasbourg, with Aaron Anselmino expected to move in the opposite direction.
